poster: V O L T I C
title: COULD RIVEN HAVE KILLED YASUOS ELDER
body: I've thought about it and I don't know she does use wind slash but she also believes in honour and she couldn't have assassinated an elder even though she's Noxian but yeah my head hurts thinking about it.

replies.body: Your a bit late on something that has been pretty much discussed since yasuo's release. There are a lot better post's explaining it, go do some research and you can probably find out more of what you missed out on.
